Question.Subject: Domain parking--any recommendations... or companies to avoid?
Question.Content: Good percentage of revenue, no fee, good optimization...which one does the best (have 100+names).
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Don’t trust any cheap service, many of them don’t allow you to have full control on your domain name. If you’re going to buy domain names, refer to:
http://www.goldpuma.com/
GoldPuma is the lowest cost service which is full-featured and really works for you ($9.99 /year). They offer free extras with every domain name:
Quick Blogcast Hosting with Web site builder Personalized Email Account Starter Web Page For Sale/ Parked Page Domain Parking Domain Forwarding Domain Masking 100-Pack Email Forwarding Total DNS Control Change of Registration Status Alerts Domain Locking …
As an experienced webmaster I recommend Goldpuma. I’m sure it would work for you and fulfill all your requirements. They have a really great offer & I have used them for over 3 yrs now, and have never had a single problem with them.
